content: [alette eyvind] Why?
[alette] Eyvind, you're ok.
[alette] Hold on, what happens to the people living in Boersgard?
[eyvind] And keep the peace... so to speak. It's more like a massacre anytime there's a hint of an uprising.
[eyvind] As soon as people figure out what's going on there's going to be riots in the streets.
[eyvind] He thought it could take as long as a month. You don't usually make ships out of scrap lumber.
[eyvind] I don't know.
[eyvind] I'm fine. It wasn't a lie, the governor is here. He's in hiding.
[eyvind] I'm open to suggestions.
[eyvind] I... promised him the menders' protection in Arberrang. I don't think he's very popular there.
[eyvind] It's the best I could do, Alette.
[eyvind] People can't leave by foot. Food is scarce, the markets are bare. Boersgard is a fire keg waiting for someone to tip it over.
/=Eyvind says nothing for a moment.=/
[eyvind] Since the dredge started appearing anyone with a ship and half a wit left long ago.
[eyvind] They're going to start tearing this place down to build new ships. We can ride the Ormsa river all the way to the capital.
[iver] A month? Why bother? Bellower will be here within the week, if not sooner!
[iver] Gods be damned, is there no end to this?!
/=Iver roars in frustration, leaving you standing by the docks. Alette gives you a worried look before chasing after him.=/
[iver] So the governor's paying the Ravens to protect him against his own people.
[rook] Eyvind...
[rook] Leaving another perfectly good city behind... how long will it take to build new ships?
[rook] What do we do about Bellower?
[rook] Where does that leave us?
{skip} mark1=rook mark2=eyvind mark3=iver mark4=alette
